      • deepFindClosestItem

        MapItem deepFindClosestItem(GeoPoint location,
                            double threshold,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Finds the closest MapItem to the specified point, that falls within the specified threshold.
        Parameters:
        location - The location
        threshold - The search threshold, in meters. Only items that are within this distance from the point are considered. If no threshold is desired, the value 0.0d should be specified.
        metadata - Extra query metadata
        Returns:
        Closest map item or null if none found

      • deepFindItems

        java.util.Collection<MapItem> deepFindItems(GeoPoint location,
                                            double radius,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Find map items within a given area
        Parameters:
        location - Geodetic location
        radius - Radius in meters
        metadata - Extra query metadata
        Returns:
        List of found map items or null if none found

      • deepFindItems

        java.util.Collection<MapItem> deepFindItems(GeoBounds bounds,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Find map items within given boundaries
        Parameters:
        bounds - Geodetic boundaries
        metadata - Extra query metadata
        Returns:
        List of found map items or null if none found

      • deepHitTest

        @Deprecated
default MapItem deepHitTest(int xpos,
                                        int ypos,
                                        GeoPoint point,

        Deprecated. Implement DeepHitTestQuery.deepHitTest(MapView, HitTestQueryParameters)
        Perform a hit-test for map items
        Parameters:
        xpos - X-position
        ypos - Y-position
        point - Ppoint on the map that was touched
        view - Map view
        Returns:
        Map item that was hit or null if none hit
